name: Shoot Away II
overview:
Shoot Away II was produced by Namco in 1993.

Another projection game featuring skeet shooting. Players use rifles to shoot clay pigeons as they fly across the panoramic screen.
The panoramic projection screen is 68 to 102 inches wide and has an actual picture of a real meadow landscape. The scoring system unit and rifle holders are placed in front of the projection screen.

The game play is a lot like the original Shoot Away except that there are more variations.
